channel.title: Donating, How to Remove
channel.description: Hello, I wanna Completly remove donating from my server, I downloaded a base and it has donor points and everything, if someone could do this for me I will give credits in the server to you. Please and thank you. =)

item.title: Donating, How to Remove
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

That means you deleted too much. Use NetBeans. It shows you where you miss a bracket.

Read full topic

item.title: Donating, How to Remove
item.dc:creator: @Dhfhy1 Dhfhy1
item.description:
@Dhfhy1 wrote:

Great Deleted everything that has to do with donator and made sure I deleted nothing else and all the brackets were there and got 100 errors in compilier.

Read full topic

item.title: Donating, How to Remove
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

For the items, I would find the item id and search that. Pretty sure your server has something like
if(player.equipmentWeapon == 9032){
if donor != 1{
sM (“You need to be a donator to use this item.”);
}
}

Don’t search that because I just bs’ed that. Conventions are probably terrible lulz.

Read full topic

item.title: Donating, How to Remove
item.dc:creator: @Dhfhy1 Dhfhy1
item.description:
@Dhfhy1 wrote:

Okay thank you, Yes I am using delta, I will make backups I just dont want to delete stuff I need, Also some items are coded to work with donor points, while deleting all the client.java files it will get rid of that right? Then I just use actual prices in item.cfg ?

Read full topic

item.title: Donating, How to Remove
item.dc:creator: @jakanddax222 jakanddax222
item.description:
@jakanddax222 wrote:

I’m not sure, but why not just don’t give out donor to people? I’ll check my server files for where it is, but I’m pretty sure its In your client.java file in server folder and player.java ( I use a delta base, Sorry if you use a different one, I’m only used to Delta ). I would recommend copying your server files and making a backup and going into client.java and player.java or your server’s equivalent file’s and doing ctrl+F and search “Donor” Look very closely at where you find Donor, and make sure to delete everything to do with the donor, Just try not to delete to much or too little.

Read full topic
